text: Legolas is a The Lord of the Rings character created by J. R. R. Tolkien. He is a Sindar Elf of the Woodland Realm and son of its king, Thranduil. He was a member of the Fellowship of the Ring. He is one of the most known Tolkien characters. He is also in many movies and video games and he was played by Orlando Bloom in Peter Jackson's The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit trilogies. == References == Category:The Lord of the Rings characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1954
title: Legolas
